name: My Uncle's Story
description:
A prequel to My Uncles Garden


Tired of your daily life in the busy city life, you can only think of getting out and making it all stop. 

Thus, one day you found an adventuring magazine with survival tips and decided to run from it all. One day after work, determined to fulfill this dream, you set out to build your new home in the middle of the Forest.

With only an handful of tools in your bag and an old truck, you begin building your house, log by log.

What could possibly go wrong...

If you liked our game consider supporting us by following, sharing and donating through the itch io page.
